title: Successful Login
description: Verify user can log in successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login endpoint POST /api/v1/auth/login.
Submit request with valid email and password.
Verify response contains authentication token and success status.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect email or password and proper error message is returned.

steps.description: Send login request with invalid email and/or password to POST /api/v1/auth/login.
Verify response status indicates failure and error message is appropriate.

title: User Registration Success
description: Verify new user registration completes successfully with valid input data.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/auth/register with valid user details.
Verify user is created and response returns success.

title: User Registration Fail with Missing Fields
description: Verify registration fails with missing required fields and returns proper validation errors.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/auth/register with incomplete user data.
Verify response returns validation errors specifying missing fields.

title: Refresh Authentication Token
description: Verify valid refresh token provides a new authentication token.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/auth/refresh with valid refresh token.
Verify response contains new access token and status success.

title: Logout Successfully
description: Verify authenticated user can log out successfully.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/auth/logout with valid authentication.
Verify session or token invalidation and success response.

title: Forgot Password Request
description: Verify user can request password reset with valid email.

steps.description: Send POST to /api/v1/auth/forgot-password with registered email.
Verify response success and reset instructions sent.

title: Retrieve List of Users
description: Verify logged-in user can retrieve paginated list of employees.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/users with valid authentication.
Verify response contains list of users with expected data.

title: Get User Details by ID
description: Verify retrieval of specific user details by user ID.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/users/:id with valid user ID.
Verify response contains detailed info of the specified user.

title: Create New User
description: Verify creating a new employee user via POST /api/v1/users works with valid data.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/users with valid user attributes.
Verify new user is created and response contains user info.

title: Update Existing User
description: Verify update of existing user details by ID via PUT /api/v1/users/:id.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/users/:id with updated attributes.
Verify user details are updated and response confirms success.

title: Delete User by ID
description: Verify deletion of a user by ID via DELETE /api/v1/users/:id.

steps.description: Send DELETE request to /api/v1/users/:id.
Verify user is removed and response indicates success.

title: Get Logged-in User Profile
description: Verify authenticated user can retrieve own profile data via GET /api/v1/users/profile.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/users/profile with authentication token.
Verify response contains profile information of logged-in user.

title: Check-in Attendance Successfully with Valid Geofence and Face Recognition
description: Verify employee can check-in attendance only within geofenced area and using face recognition.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/attendance/check-in with valid geolocation and accepted face data.
Verify check-in is successful and recorded in attendance system.

title: Check-in Attendance Failure Outside Geofence
description: Verify attendance check-in is denied if employee tries to check in outside allowed geofence.

steps.description: Send POST /api/v1/attendance/check-in request with geolocation outside allowed area.
Verify check-in is rejected and proper error message is returned.

title: Check-in Attendance Failure with Face Recognition Mismatch
description: Verify attendance check-in fails when face recognition does not match registered user.

steps.description: Send POST /api/v1/attendance/check-in with invalid or unmatched face recognition data.
Verify system rejects check-in and returns face recognition failure message.

title: Successful Check-out Attendance
description: Verify employee can check-out successfully after checking in.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/attendance/check-out with valid authentication and active check-in record.
Verify check-out is recorded properly and attendance duration calculated.

title: Check-out Without Prior Check-in
description: Verify check-out fails if employee has not checked in first.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/attendance/check-out without existing active check-in.
Verify check-out is rejected with proper error message.

title: Retrieve My Attendance Records
description: Verify logged-in user can retrieve own attendance records via GET /api/v1/attendance/my-records.

steps.description: Send GET /api/v1/attendance/my-records with valid authentication.
Verify response returns correct attendance records for user.

title: Retrieve Today's Attendance Records
description: Verify system returns list of today's attendance entries via GET /api/v1/attendance/today.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/attendance/today with authenticated user.
Verify response contains attendance records of today as per user role.

title: Generate Attendance Report
description: Verify attendance report generation with filters and summarization via GET /api/v1/attendance/report.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/attendance/report with date range and filtering parameters.
Verify response contains correct filtered attendance report data.

title: Create Leave Request Successfully
description: Verify employee can create a leave request with valid dates and reason via POST /api/v1/leaves.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/leaves with valid leave details.
Confirm leave request is stored and response returns success.

title: Fetch Leave Requests List
description: Verify retrieval of list of leave requests via GET /api/v1/leaves with pagination.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/leaves.
Verify response returns paginated list of leave requests.

title: Get Leave Request Details by ID
description: Verify retrieval of single leave request details via GET /api/v1/leaves/:id.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/leaves/:id with valid leave ID.
Verify response returns details of the specified leave request.

title: Update Leave Request
description: Verify update of leave request details via PUT /api/v1/leaves/:id before approval.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/leaves/:id with updated leave information.
Verify leave request is updated successfully if not approved yet.

title: Delete Leave Request
description: Verify deletion of leave request via DELETE /api/v1/leaves/:id before approval.

steps.description: Send DELETE request to /api/v1/leaves/:id.
Verify leave request is deleted if not approved and response confirms success.

title: Approve Leave Request
description: Verify manager can approve leave request via PUT /api/v1/leaves/:id/approve.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/leaves/:id/approve as authorized manager.
Verify leave request status is updated to approved and notification sent.

title: Reject Leave Request
description: Verify manager can reject leave request via PUT /api/v1/leaves/:id/reject.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/leaves/:id/reject as authorized manager.
Verify leave request status is updated to rejected and notification sent.

title: Check Leave Balance
description: Verify employee can retrieve current leave balance via GET /api/v1/leaves/balance.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/leaves/balance as authenticated user.
Verify response shows correct leave balance amounts.

title: Create New Branch
description: Verify creation of new branch via POST /api/v1/branches with valid data.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/branches with valid branch details.
Verify branch is created and response contains new branch info.

title: Retrieve Branch List
description: Verify retrieval of all branches via GET /api/v1/branches.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/branches.
Verify response returns list of branches.

title: Get Branch Details by ID
description: Verify retrieval of branch details via GET /api/v1/branches/:id.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/branches/:id with valid branch ID.
Verify response contains branch details.

title: Update Branch Details
description: Verify updating branch info via PUT /api/v1/branches/:id.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/branches/:id with updated information.
Verify branch info is updated successfully.

title: Delete Branch
description: Verify deletion of branch via DELETE /api/v1/branches/:id.

steps.description: Send DELETE request to /api/v1/branches/:id.
Confirm deletion and response success.

title: Create Department Successfully
description: Verify creation of new department via POST /api/v1/departments with valid data.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/departments with valid department data.
Verify department is created and response confirms success.

title: Retrieve Departments List
description: Verify retrieval of list of departments via GET /api/v1/departments.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/departments.
Verify response includes departments data.

title: Update Department Details
description: Verify updating a department name or info via PUT /api/v1/departments/:id.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/departments/:id with updated details.
Confirm department is updated and response returns success.

title: Dashboard Summary Retrieval
description: Verify executive dashboard summary data is retrievable via GET /api/v1/dashboard.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/dashboard.
Verify dashboard data is returned with key metrics.

title: Dashboard Stats Retrieval
description: Verify retrieval of dashboard statistics via GET /api/v1/dashboard/stats.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/dashboard/stats.
Confirm stats data correctness and completeness.

title: Dashboard Attendance Summary
description: Verify retrieval of attendance summary on dashboard via GET /api/v1/dashboard/attendance-summary.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/dashboard/attendance-summary.
Verify correct attendance summary data is returned.

title: Retrieve Notification List
description: Verify user can get list of notifications via GET /api/v1/notifications.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/notifications as authenticated user.
Verify response contains user notification items.

title: Mark Notification as Read
description: Verify user can mark a single notification as read via PUT /api/v1/notifications/:id/read.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/notifications/:id/read for specific notification.
Confirm notification status updated to read.

title: Mark All Notifications as Read
description: Verify user can mark all notifications as read via PUT /api/v1/notifications/read-all.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/notifications/read-all.
Verify all notifications are marked as read in response.

title: Retrieve System Settings
description: Verify retrieval of current company/system settings via GET /api/v1/settings.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/settings.
Verify response returns current system settings.

title: Update System Settings
description: Verify update of company or system settings via PUT /api/v1/settings with valid data.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/settings with updated settings data.
Confirm settings updated and response confirms success.

title: Retrieve Holidays List
description: Verify retrieval of company holidays via GET /api/v1/settings/holidays.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/settings/holidays.
Verify response includes list of holidays with dates.

title: Create Payroll Run Successfully
description: Verify that a payroll run can be created via POST /api/v1/payroll-runs with valid data.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/payroll-runs with valid payroll calculation parameters.
Verify payroll run is created and response returns correct details.

title: List Payroll Runs
description: Verify retrieval of list of payroll runs via GET /api/v1/payroll-runs.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/payroll-runs.
Verify response returns correct list of payroll runs.

title: Get Payroll Run Details
description: Verify retrieval of detailed payroll run information via GET /api/v1/payroll-runs/:id.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/payroll-runs/:id with valid payroll run ID.
Verify response contains details of the specified payroll run.

title: Approve Payroll Run
description: Verify that a payroll run can be approved via PUT /api/v1/payroll-runs/:id/approve.

steps.description: Send PUT request to /api/v1/payroll-runs/:id/approve as authorized user.
Verify payroll run status is updated to approved and response confirms success.
